name: Bomb Rush (DaftLion)
description: Play in a 1st person Bomberman, in a randomized maze! Smash the walls with your bombs to progress through the maze. Throw bombs at your opponents to be the last one alive! In some walls are hidden bonuses... or not. You prefer a faster mode? Then choose the blitz mode. You have a limited time to hit the most enemies in a futuristic maze. A single player game or multiplayer up to 4 people.
